subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: The Mets and the Royals, as indefatigable a team as exists in the American League, played a long evening’s journey into night, five hours and 14 innings’ worth.
snippet: The Mets and the Royals, as indefatigable a team as exists in the American League, played a long evening’s journey into night, five hours and 14 innings’ worth.
